casebody.data:
Steven K. STANLEY
v.
Adam B. SCOTT Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 22, 2019

Steven K. Stanley, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 901, 202 A.3d 481 (2019), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
